description: A s h a m   t a l u y .   H ̣ e l e k ̣   s h e n i .   ( P o l e m i c a l   o b s e r v a t i o n s   o n   t h e   N e w   T e s t a m e n t ,   a r r a n g e d   a n d   w i t h   a d d i t i o n s   b y   J o s h u a   S e g r e )
title: Asham taluy. Ḥeleḳ sheni. (Polemical observations on the New Testament, arranged and with additions by Joshua Segre)
author: Briel, Judah ben Eliezer
